# train

## (Deprecated) Train a Model

## Description
Train a model object. See implementation in the tfestimators package. 


## Usage
```r
train(object, ...) 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| object | A trainable `R` object. |
| ... | Optional arguments passed on to implementing methods. |
